price: 3. De nada os servirán vuestros familiares cercanos y vuestros hijos el Día de la Resurrección, pues (Al-lah) os juzgará (según hayáis obrado); y Al-lah observa todo lo que hacéis.
arabic: لَن تَنفَعَكُمۡ أَرۡحَامُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡۚ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
category: She that is to be Examined

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lan tanfaʿakum arḥāmukum walā awlādukum yawma al-qiyāmati yafṣilu baynakum wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
